![](C:\Users\19392516\Documents\GitHub\Docs\Box Plot Image.png)



* The center line represents the median, A split 50/50 split of the data. 
     - The median is resistant to extreme values, thus a reliable metric for wait times.


* Values within the middle shaded area consist of 50% of our data


* Points beyond the outer lines are considered outliers.
